headline: Canada’s Iranian Diaspora Battles Grief and Anger Over 57 Killed in Plane Crash
abstract: Of the 176 victims, 57 Canadians died on the flight that crashed on its way from Tehran to Ukraine. Many were students or faculty at the University of Alberta in Edmonton.
lead_paragraph: EDMONTON, Alberta — The fume hoods in the lab set up by Saba Saadat were silent on Friday, its computers and microscopes switched off. Sobs occasionally punctuated the silence.
